item.title: Being on a Career Panel
item.description: As a University of Melbourne alumnus, I was invited to be on a career panel on Open Day and share my experience as a software engineer with future students. Students attending such panel discussions may hope to replicate panelists’ career decisions. However, this approach hardly works. Here’s why.

item.title: Binary Search for Scala Collections
item.description: Binary search is efficient in locating an element or insertion position in a sorted collection. Many programming languages implement binary search for collections in their standard library. Scala is no exception.

item.title: Hello World
item.description: A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
